package.name: XML Engine (Dev)
package.summary: Raw XML output XML-Template theme for the Serendipity Styx Blog system
package.description: Simple theme from 2006, newly refurbished to work with Serendipity Styx Edition. This theme outputs raw XML on the frontside, to make the content readable by XML-Readers. It does still effect some minor plugin integrations on the backend side, like linktrimmer or amazonchooser, and is more or less meant to be used in a non-too-much-extended core release blog, though it does works with some well known plugin apps, like staticpages, freetags etc.

package.name: MT - Clean
package.summary: Additional full-screen theme from 2004-06-29. Now 2019, and as an example, fully mobile first responsive.
package.description: This "MT-Trendy" child port (by date), basically an early days ~2003 MovableType "Clean" theme port, is styled by CSS only. Theme-wise it is a sister theme of MT-Georgiablue and MT-Plainjane. Without any theme engine set, all template files are taken from default theme. Fixed and basically upgraded for Serendipity Styx 2.1+ revisions.

package.name: wp-clone
package.summary: Additional old full-screen, 2-sidebar and styles only theme from 2004-06-24 to 2007-04-03, fully based on default template files.
package.description: Fixed and basically upgraded for Serendipity Styx 2.1+ revisions.

package.name: xkur
package.summary: Additional old small-screen theme from 2006-01-26 to 2013-10-26, with a fixed content width of 1024px.
package.description: Fixed and basically upgraded for Serendipity Styx 2.1+ revisions. Based on Carl Galloway`s Serendipity Theme 3.0.

package.name: YoungButStrong port
package.summary: Additional old theme from 2007-07-17 to 2008-02-14 with a concatenated sidebar to the right and with a size of ~850 pixel mainframe width.
package.description: Fixed and basically upgraded for Serendipity Styx 2.1+ revisions. If this sponsored links usage note is still valid after all these years is at least questionable. Perhaps you could simply make your own engine template without.., without violating..

package.name: Zenlike (contains sponsor links)
package.summary: Additional old theme from 2007-10-09 to 2009-08-26 with a concatenated sidebar to the right. Ported to Serendipity by YellowLed.
package.description: Fixed and basically upgraded for Serendipity Styx 2.1+ revisions. For removing the sponsored links you might still need to ask.
